snippet: Questions are growing in the Indian National Congress party as Rahul Gandhi, the scion of a political dynasty, appears poised to preside over a devastating defeat.
abstract: Rahul Gandhi, scion of India’s most powerful political dynasty, appears poised to preside over the most devastating defeat in the history of Indian National Congress party, which has governed country for much of the past six decades.

byline.contributor: Suhasini Raj contributed reporting from Amethi, India.

lead_paragraph: Questions are growing in the Indian National Congress party as Rahul Gandhi, the scion of a political dynasty, appears poised to preside over a devastating defeat.

headline.main: An Uneasy Inheritance of India’s Political Dynasty
headline.print_headline: An Uneasy Inheritance of India’s Political Dynasty
